properties.entry: SELECT CLI_NO, HOS_NAME, CLI_CATE, CLI_NAME, CLI_PRICE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, DES_PATH FROM TB_CLI JOIN TB_CLI_CATE USING(CATE_NO) JOIN TB_HOSPITAL USING(HOS_NO) WHERE CATE_NO = ?
SELECT CLI_NO, HOS_NAME, CLI_CATE, CLI_NAME, CLI_PRICE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, DES_PATH FROM TB_CLI JOIN TB_CLI_CATE USING(CATE_NO) JOIN TB_HOSPITAL USING(HOS_NO) WHERE CLI_NO = ?
SELECT DISTINCT CLI_DATE FROM TB_CLI_TIME WHERE CLI_NO = ?
SELECT TIME_NO, CLI_NO, CLI_TIME, CLI_DATE FROM TB_CLI_TIME WHERE CLI_NO = ? AND CLI_DATE = ? AND CLI_TIME NOT IN( SELECT RES_TIME FROM TB_CLI_RES WHERE CLI_NO = ? ) ORDER BY TIME_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CLI_RES WHERE CLI_NO = ? AND MEM_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_CLI_REV VALUES ( SEQ_CLI_REV_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE, ? )
SELECT ROUND(AVG(CLI_SCOPE),1) FROM TB_CLI_REV WHERE CLI_NO = ?
SELECT REV_NO, CLI_NO, NICKNAME, REV_CONTENT, CR.CREATE_DATE, CLI_SCOPE FROM TB_CLI_REV CR JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE CLI_NO = ? ORDER BY REV_NO DESC
